i18n.title: Image Gallery with Horizontal Scroll
i18n.description: In this lab, we will delve into the world of CSS programming to create a responsive image gallery with a horizontal scroll. The purpose of this lab is to teach you how to use CSS properties to create a visually appealing and interactive gallery that allows users to scroll through images seamlessly. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to create a horizontal scrollable image gallery using CSS.

meta.title: Responsive Image Gallery with Horizontal Scroll
meta.description: Learn how to create a visually appealing and interactive image gallery with a horizontal scroll using CSS.
meta.keywords: css, css practice, responsive design, image gallery, css playground, horizontal scroll, web development, css lab, css exercises

i18n.title: 带水平滚动条的图像画廊
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将深入探讨 CSS 编程的世界，创建一个带有水平滚动条的响应式图像画廊。本实验的目的是教你如何使用 CSS 属性来创建一个视觉上吸引人且交互式的画廊，使用户能够无缝浏览图像。在本实验结束时，你将对如何使用 CSS 创建水平可滚动的图像画廊有扎实的理解。
